title: Enhancing Nursing Practical Skills: Mixed-Methods Research Workshop for Developing Instructional Design Expertise

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Students can systematically derive learning design requirements using literature analysis techniques.
Students can diagnose learning design issues in language education by applying mixed research methods (quantitative + qualitative).
Students can establish a learning design professional development roadmap aligned with international standards (UK/Australia/North America cases).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
